attributes.action: Ban e-cigarettes & vaping indoors / public places (align them with cigarettes)
attributes.additional_details:
There have always been concerns regarding the long term impacts that e-cigarettes & vaping could have on people and these impacts are potentially starting to show themselves in people who use these.

E-cigarettes & vapers seem to show huge benefits in comparison to normal cigarettes which is tremendous; however we don't know if they come with risks. Let's take precautionary measures to not repeat old failures.

SHS: https://ash.org.uk/category/information-and-resources/secondhand-smoke/
Paragraph: The Unknown About E-Cigarettes and Vaping: https://mphdegree.usc.edu/blog/understanding-the-implications-of-vaping-and-e-cigarettes/
attributes.background:
Smoking indoors was banned because second hand smoke (SHS) can cause serious health issues in non-smokers, most of all, children.
For years SHS existed because precautions weren't put in place to protect people from what they didn't know.
Let's prevent similar consequences with this petition
